sentences.en: He did it out of slick perversity.
sentences.cn: 他全然是出于不合情理的想法做了这件事的.

sentences.en: It is not a perversity nowadays for a girl to have a crew cut.
sentences.cn: 现在女孩子剪平头并非是种反常的行为.

sentences.en: It is not simple moral perversity that keeps sex and violence on the air.
sentences.cn: 性和暴力的节目广为传播,这不单纯是道德沦丧.

sentences.en: It would be wrong to continue out of perversity.
sentences.cn: 为了故意作对而继续这样做是不对的。

sentences.en: Put away perversity from your mouth; keep corrupt talk far from your lips.
sentences.cn: 24你要除掉邪 僻 的口,弃绝乖谬的嘴.

sentences.en: She's marrying him out of sheer perversity.
The best of us have a spice of perversity in us.
sentences.cn: 在我们最出色的人身上都有任性的一面.

sentences.en: The perversity of the weather did some damage to the crops.
sentences.cn: 反常的天气给作物带来了一些损害.

sentences.en: This about not loving her, physically, bodily, was a mere perversity on his part.
sentences.cn: 这种所谓不能在肉体上爱她完全是他一种反常的表现.

sentences.en: This is very strange. It is strange to the point of perversity.
sentences.cn: 这实在是非常奇怪, 而且奇怪到很变态的一种心态.

sentences.en: Was perversity, that I longed to talk to him?
sentences.cn: 是由于错乱, 我渴望和他交谈?

sentences.en: Who with perversity in his heart continually devises evil, Who spreads strife.
sentences.cn: 箴6:14心中乖僻、常设恶谋 、 布散纷争.

words.tran_cn: 歪曲的；不正当的；性变态的
